verses.verse: וַיִּפְשַׁ֤ע <S%H6586><s%> rebelled מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> Then Moab בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after מ֥וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death אַחְאָֽב׃ <S%H256><s%> of Ahab

וַיִּפֹּ֨ל <S%H5307><s%> fell down אֲחַזְיָ֜ה <S%H274><s%> And Ahaziah בְּעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> through הַשְּׂבָכָ֗ה <S%H7639><s%> through a lattice בַּעֲלִיָּת֛וֹ <S%H5944><s%> in his upper chamber אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּשֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> that [was] in Samaria וַיָּ֑חַל <S%H2470><s%> and was sick וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and he sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go דִרְשׁ֗וּ <S%H1875><s%> enquire בְּבַ֤עַל זְבוּב֙ <S%H1176><s%> of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the god עֶקְר֔וֹן <S%H6138><s%> of Ekron אִם־ <S%H518><s%> whether אֶחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> whether I shall recover מֵחֳלִ֥י <S%H2483><s%> of this disease זֶֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this ס

וּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> But the angel יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD דִּבֶּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֵלִיָּ֣ה <S%H452><s%> to Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֔י <S%H8664><s%> the Tishbite ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise עֲלֵ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> go up לִקְרַ֖את <S%H7125><s%> to meet מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <S%H4397><s%> the messengers מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria וְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <S%H1097><s%> corruption אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> unto them [Is it] not because [there is] not a God בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you הֹֽלְכִ֔ים <S%H1980><s%> [that] ye go לִדְרֹ֕שׁ <S%H1875><s%> to enquire בְּבַ֥עַל זְב֖וּב <S%H1176><s%> of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the god עֶקְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H6138><s%> Ekron

וְלָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> now therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Now therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַמִּטָּ֞ה <S%H4296><s%> from that bed אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you עָלִ֥יתָ <S%H5927><s%> on which thou art gone up שָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> Thou shalt not come down מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> but shalt surely תָּמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> die וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed אֵלִיָּֽה׃ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah

וַיָּשׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> turned back הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <S%H4397><s%> And when the messengers אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him he said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why זֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> unto them Why are ye now שַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H7725><s%> turned back

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> a man עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> up לִקְרָאתֵ֗נוּ <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> us and said אֵלֵינוּ֮ <S%H413><s%> to us לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go שׁוּבוּ֮ <S%H7725><s%> turn again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> that sent אֶתְכֶם֒ <S%H853><s%> וְדִבַּרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H1696><s%> you and say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <S%H1097><s%> corruption אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> [Is it] not because [there is] not a God בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you שֹׁלֵ֔חַ <S%H7971><s%> [that] thou sendest לִדְרֹ֕שׁ <S%H1875><s%> to enquire בְּבַ֥עַל זְב֖וּב <S%H1176><s%> of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the god עֶקְר֑וֹן <S%H6138><s%> Ekron לָ֠כֵן <S%H3651><s%> from הַמִּטָּ֞ה <S%H4296><s%> from that bed אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עָלִ֥יתָ <S%H5927><s%> on which thou art gone up שָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> come מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> but מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> but shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> die

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֚ה <S%H4100><s%> What מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> unto them What manner הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who עָלָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> [was he] which came up לִקְרַאתְכֶ֑ם <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> you and told אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they answered אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> archer שֵׂעָ֔ר <S%H8181><s%> him [He was] an hairy וְאֵז֥וֹר <S%H232><s%> with a girdle ע֖וֹר <S%H5785><s%> of leather אָז֣וּר <S%H247><s%> and girt בְּמָתְנָ֑יו <S%H4975><s%> about his loins וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלִיָּ֥ה <S%H452><s%> It [is] Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֖י <S%H8664><s%> the Tishbite הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> to him שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> unto him a captain חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> of fifty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑יו <S%H2572><s%> with his fifty וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> And he went up אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> behold יֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> to him and behold he sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> on the top הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> of an hill וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> And he spake אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto him Thou man הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> hath said רֵֽדָה׃ <S%H3381><s%> Come down

וַיַּעֲנֶ֣ה <S%H6030><s%> answered אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah וַיְדַבֵּר֮ <S%H1696><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> to the captain הַחֲמִשִּׁים֒ <S%H2572><s%> of fifty וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If I [be] a man אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I תֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> come down אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> then let fire מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וְתֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> and consume אֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמִשֶּׁ֑יךָ <S%H2572><s%> thee and thy fifty וַתֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> And there came down אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> fire מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וַתֹּ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> and consumed אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמִשָּֽׁיו׃ <S%H2572><s%> him and his fifty

וַיָּ֜שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> Again וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> also he sent אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> captain חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> of fifty אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> unto him another וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑יו <S%H2572><s%> with his fifty וַיַּ֙עַן֙ <S%H6030><s%> And he answered וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto him O man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> thus hath the king מְהֵרָ֥ה <S%H4120><s%> quickly רֵֽדָה׃ <S%H3381><s%> Come down

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אֵלִיָּה֮ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> and said אֲלֵיהֶם֒ <S%H413><s%> to אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto them If I [be] a man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I תֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> come down אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> let fire מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וְתֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> and consume אֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמִשֶּׁ֑יךָ <S%H2572><s%> thee and thy fifty וַתֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> came down אֵשׁ־ <S%H784><s%> And the fire אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וַתֹּ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> and consumed אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמִשָּֽׁיו׃ <S%H2572><s%> him and his fifty

וַיָּ֗שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> again וַיִּשְׁלַ֛ח <S%H7971><s%> And he sent שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> a captain חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty שְׁלִשִׁ֖ים <S%H7992><s%> of the third וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑יו <S%H2572><s%> with his fifty וַיַּ֡עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> and came שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> captain הַחֲמִשִּׁ֨ים <S%H2572><s%> of fifty הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֜י <S%H7992><s%> And the third וַיִּכְרַ֥ע <S%H3766><s%> and fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בִּרְכָּ֣יו ׀ <S%H1290><s%> on his knees לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H452><s%> Elijah וַיִּתְחַנֵּ֤ן <S%H2603><s%> and besought אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> and וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> him and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto him O man הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God תִּֽיקַר־ <S%H3365><s%> be precious נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> I pray thee let my life וְנֶ֨פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and the life עֲבָדֶ֥יךָֽ <S%H5650><s%> thy servants אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> of these fifty בְּעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight

הִ֠נֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יָ֤רְדָה <S%H3381><s%> down אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> fire מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וַ֠תֹּאכַל <S%H398><s%> and burnt up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֞י <S%H8147><s%> the two שָׂרֵ֧י <S%H8269><s%> captains הַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> fifties הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <S%H7223><s%> of the former וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמִשֵּׁיהֶ֑ם <S%H2572><s%> with their fifties וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now תִּיקַ֥ר <S%H3365><s%> now be precious נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> therefore let my life בְּעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight ס
